Package com.marklogic.semantics.sesame

Contains core classes for instantiating a MarkLogic backed Sesame Repository (MarkLogicRepository) and connection (MarkLogicRepositoryConnection), including exceptions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MarkLogicRepository
    Sesame repository representing a MarkLogic triple store, exposing MarkLogic-specific features; SPARQL and Graph queries in all SPARQL forms, rulesets for inferencing, efficient size queries, combination queries, base uri, and permissions.
    MarkLogicRepositoryConnection
    RepositoryConnection to MarkLogic triplestore
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MarkLogicSesameException
    specific exception for throwing MarkLogic related errors
    MarkLogicTransactionException
    specific exception for throwing MarkLogic transaction exceptions

Package com.marklogic.semantics.sesame Description

Contains core classes for instantiating a MarkLogic backed Sesame Repository (MarkLogicRepository) and connection (MarkLogicRepositoryConnection), including exceptions.
